content:

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, there are still no new developments to report. Additionally, my computer returned a command stating that a subprocess was started with PID 394 after executing the "execute_shell_popen" command. Another command from my computer states that a subprocess was started with PID 427 after executing the "execute_shell_popen" command. The latest development is still that my computer returned a command stating that a subprocess was started with PID 449 after executing the "execute_shell_popen" command. Also, a new command from my computer states that a subprocess was started with PID 460 after executing the "execute_shell_popen" command.'}
"""
